title: The Styrian activities in nano Surface Engineering: Development of nanostructured coatings for the design of multifunctional surfaces
segmentation: Good morning ladies and gentlemen, it's a great honor and pleasure for me to give you a short presentation on the Australian student activities in Nano Surface engineering.
And I also will give you some scientific results of our working group.
Can you hear me?
Is the microphone working yet?
Thank you also for the nice introduction.
And.
I will start my presentation with a short overview of the Austrian Nano Initiative.

And then I will give you some details on this tour and activities in nanotechnology and afterwards I will show you some research activities in the field of nano surface engineering at UNM Research and I will finish my presentation with conclusions.

The Austrian Nano Initiative is my two annual program which is funding the scientists in the field of nanotechnology in Austria, and this initiative coordinates measures in national and regional levels, and this initiative is supported by several ministries of Austria, also by different federal provinces or federal states.
And by our Austrian funding institutions, the program is managed by the Austrian Research Promotion Agency and this is done in behalf of the Federal Ministry for Transport, Innovation and Technology.
And the objectives of this Austria Nano initiatives are.
That it should strengthen and network the Austrian Nano players in science and in industry.
This is very important and the goal is to build up critical methods for positioning the Austrian Nano players in international competition.
As mentioned before, this initiative is supported by ministries and also the Federal States and the final goal is to use Nano.
For industry, so it's a very application orientated program which connects basic research and.
Applied research and as another very important goal is to build and expand the infrastructure which is necessary for research work in nano surface or engineering, also in nanotech.
Knowledge in general.

The target groups of these initiatives are the Nano players from University, also from non University research organizations like your name research as well as Austrian companies but also international partners are welcomed to participate in this program but they will not directly get financial support.

Which started in 2000.

Different research projects.

Of Austria yes.
Coming to the first project line, you see, we have 5 so-called project clusters working in different fields of nanotechnology, and I will focus my presentation on the Project Nano code.
That means development of nanostructured coatings for the design of my teeth.
Optional services.

In the second program line, we have the Austrian Nano Forum and it's a platform which strength the communication between the Austrian players in nanotechnology and their existing different networks, and one of the most important is the nanonet Steria.
I think I have given two years ago with presentation about this network here.
In ljubljana.
